constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 160 (Tuesday, October 4, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. BICE of Oklahoma:
H.R. 9125.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H8378]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Reform, and House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Safe Leave for Victims of Domestic Violence Act
